featured.text: The adapted rides include the Off-Road Adventure, where guests can test their driving skills in sporty vehicles.

definition.zh_def: 運動的；喜愛運動的，通常指身體健康或穿著運動風格的。
definition.en_def: Having a strong interest in sports or physical activities; characterized by an athletic appearance or style.
definition.example: She wore a sporty outfit to the gym.
